before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fbe0i","text":"Put pipettes and tips in the UV chamber for 10 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4lo1l","text":"Clean bench with MQ and EtOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7uplg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9onm","text":"We have a common stock of barcoded primers stored in the -80C freezer number 3. The primers are in an orange box, which box can be found in the position indicated on the following picture:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"44onq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2naru","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2gr4a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"16l5l","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ccfbl","text":"In the box from 1 to 20 are the forward primers and from 37 to 56 are the reverse primers. The last line has extras from some primers. If you run out of a barcode, check those first before ordering. Check primer ordering file on common server for primer ordering. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"amg2m","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5s9ku","text":"Sequence of barcodes to fill in the SampleSheet file for sequencing: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":67,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"250sc","text":"   Index 2 (i5) Index 2 (i5) Sequence Index 1 (i7) Index 1 (i7) Sequence   Illu_N501F TAGATCGC Illu_N701R TCGCCTTA   Illu_N502F CTCTCTAT Illu_N702R CTAGTACG   Illu_N503F TATCCTCT Illu_N703R TTCTGCCT   Illu_N504F AGAGTAGA Illu_N704R GCTCAGGA   Illu_N505F GTAAGGAG Illu_N705R AGGAGTCC   Illu_N506F ACTGCATA Illu_N706R CATGCCTA   Illu_N507F AAGGAGTA Illu_N707R GTAGAGAG   Illu_N508F CTAAGCCT Illu_N708R CCTCTCTG   Illu_N521F CTTGCTTT Illu_N709R AGCGTAGC   Illu_N522F GGCTTCAA Illu_N710R CAGCCTCG   Illu_N523F AATCGGCA Illu_N711R TGCCTCTT   Illu_N524F GGTTCAAA Illu_N712R TCCTCTAC   Illu_N525F ACTTCGAC Illu_N733R GGTATAAG   Illu_N526F TGACTTGC Illu_N735R CAGCTAGA   Illu_N527F TAGGACCT Illu_N736R CCATAGCA   Illu_N528F GGAGACTT Illu_N738R GGTATAGC   Illu_N529F AGGTTACG Illu_N739R GGTTATGC   Illu_N530F AATTCGCT Illu_N740R TAGGCAAG   Illu_N531F TCAGCTAA Illu_N741R TTGTCCAT   Illu_N532F GCGATATG Illu_N743R TCTAGGCA   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":915}],"data":[]},{"key":"5rbc","text":"Note: the sequence of the reverse barcodes to fill in the SampleSheet is the reverse complement of their sequence of in the primers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":132}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"do5f6","text":"The 1st part of the protocol is performed in the pre-PCR room. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":5,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fiko8","text":"The 2nd part in the post-PCR room.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":5,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a0sht","text":"Never bring back PCR products to the pre-PCR room.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"imageblock","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"41C95190F17C48EAB017941ADCBFC4B2","height":null,"is_video":false,"mime":null,"original_name":"IMG_9851.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/sq8ejrw.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/sq8ejrw.jpg","width":null}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","10_0":"","10_1":"","10_2":"","10_3":"","11_0":"","11_1":"","11_2":"","11_3":"","12_0":"","12_1":"","12_2":"","12_3":"","13_0":"","13_1":"","13_2":"","13_3":"","14_0":"","14_1":"","14_2":"","14_3":"","15_0":"","15_1":"","15_2":"","15_3":"","16_0":"","16_1":"","16_2":"","16_3":"","17_0":"","17_1":"","17_2":"","17_3":"","18_0":"","18_1":"","18_2":"","18_3":"","19_0":"","19_1":"","19_2":"","19_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","20_0":"","20_1":"","20_2":"","20_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","4_3":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","5_3":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","6_2":"","6_3":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","7_2":"","7_3":"","8_0":"","8_1":"","8_2":"","8_3":"","9_0":"","9_1":"","9_2":"","9_3":""},"colWidths":[50,50,50,50],"data":[["Index 2 (i5)","Index 2 (i5) Sequence","Index 1 (i7)","Index 1 (i7) Sequence"],["Illu_N501F","TAGATCGC","Illu_N701R","TCGCCTTA"],["Illu_N502F","CTCTCTAT","Illu_N702R","CTAGTACG"],["Illu_N503F","TATCCTCT","Illu_N703R","TTCTGCCT"],["Illu_N504F","AGAGTAGA","Illu_N704R","GCTCAGGA"],["Illu_N505F","GTAAGGAG","Illu_N705R","AGGAGTCC"],["Illu_N506F","ACTGCATA","Illu_N706R","CATGCCTA"],["Illu_N507F","AAGGAGTA","Illu_N707R","GTAGAGAG"],["Illu_N508F","CTAAGCCT","Illu_N708R","CCTCTCTG"],["Illu_N521F","CTTGCTTT","Illu_N709R","AGCGTAGC"],["Illu_N522F","GGCTTCAA","Illu_N710R","CAGCCTCG"],["Illu_N523F","AATCGGCA","Illu_N711R","TGCCTCTT"],["Illu_N524F","GGTTCAAA","Illu_N712R","TCCTCTAC"],["Illu_N525F","ACTTCGAC","Illu_N733R","GGTATAAG"],["Illu_N526F","TGACTTGC","Illu_N735R","CAGCTAGA"],["Illu_N527F","TAGGACCT","Illu_N736R","CCATAGCA"],["Illu_N528F","GGAGACTT","Illu_N738R","GGTATAGC"],["Illu_N529F","AGGTTACG","Illu_N739R","GGTTATGC"],["Illu_N530F","AATTCGCT","Illu_N740R","TAGGCAAG"],["Illu_N531F","TCAGCTAA","Illu_N741R","TTGTCCAT"],["Illu_N532F","GCGATATG","Illu_N743R","TCTAGGCA"]],"guid":"DA8D96F0458511E99CE33B990B794995","legend":"","mergeCells":[],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23],"show_headers":true}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"919k2","text":"Check PCR products with Agarose gel electrophoresis (1%) - optional","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"825qa","text":"Pool PCR duplicate samples together and perform purification with magnetic beads (Agencourt AMPure or similar)- Optional: run Agarose gel electrophoresis (1%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v3v7","text":"Check second PCR products with Agarose gel electrophoresis (1%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4hqef","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"60","guid":"FECC98724294419F9691665CA0C06DFE","id":"16202","label":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3le1q","text":"Perform purification with magnetic beads (Agencourt AMPure) and (optional) run Agarose gel electrophoresis (1%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d0la9","text":"Quantification: using gel analyzer program or PicoGreen assay","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5s8m0","text":"Calculate PCR samples concentration and volume before pooling","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"78nsf","text":"Pool the PCR samples in equal DNA amount (ng) or for unequal length amplicons, in equal molecule amount (mol).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ev9og","text":"You will get one tube with a mix of all the samples in it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"oc2i","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"asm1n","text":"To calculate the volume of each sample to be pooled (DNA amount mixing):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bdtpu","text":"Use the lowest concentration sample to define the minimum amount of DNA (ng) that you have available from a single sample: the DNA concentration (ng/μL) of the lowest concentration sample multiplied with its volume (μL). This will be your target DNA amount for each sample.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":239,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4rk5m","text":"Calculate how many μLs of each sample you need to achieve the target DNA amount: divide the target DNA amount with the concentration of each sample.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":17},{"style":"bold","offset":91,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3mt07","text":"Pipette into one tube the calculated volume of each sample. Aim to use the same pipette for all samples (dilute or pipette multiple times) to avoid pipette calibration errors.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5h32f","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aego7","text":"Gel purify the pool and requantify with PicoGreen before submitting to sequencing facility.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
